full_text:
Small sample, but Mike White has been the best passer for the #Jets all year.

The work of Flacco/Wilson has been poor at best, but Mike White seems to take this passing offense to a whole other level. 

Passing EPA/play for each QB's 2022 work. #nflverse https://t.co/KTrSWK3vSy

New York Giants
Down & Distance-to-Go Summary

Giants finding success in 2nd & long and 3rd & short

#nflverse

Please like this because it took me 8 hours to make https://t.co/5iqiWPQ7I1

Play-action rate for QBs with min 100 attempts

Bottom number labels represent # of PA attempts
Darkness of bar represents yards per PA attempt

Daniel Jones
PA Rate: 23.9% (4th)
7.2 yards per PA attempt (27th)

#TogetherBlue #nflverse https://t.co/AIKF0Qy3iD

#nflverse
I remember seeing a shiny app that allowed you to filter NFLreadR data based on all sorts of fields.
Does anyone happen to know what app this was?

As a follow-up, this time I determined the average point differential separately for wins and losses.
The sample size for some teams, e.g. the losing side of the Eagles or the winning side of the Texans, is quite small. But still some nice insights.
#nflverse https://t.co/DhGTR3yo0e https://t.co/NjBNFEqFdZ

I did this especially because of the Ravens...
They better not lead with a TD or more at halftime
#nflverse https://t.co/GBwt7nDOUh

ğ—•ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—²ğ—¿ ğ— ğ—®ğ˜†ğ—³ğ—¶ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—±'ğ˜€ game summary versus LV.

Was cool to see Baker have his moment last night, finishing with an EPA/Play in the 68th percentile off a 48-hour turnaround.

That one shot deep-left was ğŸ’°.

#nflverse https://t.co/yBW8FQPZx1

Updated prior to Week 14: Relative team efficiency scores, constructed using a blend of z-score standardized EPA/P and SR%

Data is from weeks 4-13. Early downs, opponent adjusted, turnovers are excluded, garbage time is excluded

#nflverse https://t.co/BoSQd2BHmz

Pillboxes for KC vs CIN. Pacheco leading the team in snaps for the second straight week. Got two targets early, then none after that. Watson second in snaps, even with JuJu back. 6 of Moore's first 7 snaps were pass plays, then only 4 of his last 12. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/pZFjeD9kTy

On to Defense. After tons of snaps the last few weeks, Cook only gets 6 (5 on 3rd downs). Gay lost TWO series to Harris this week instead of just 1. Karlaftis snaps dropped significantly. Only Nnadi and Stallworth had fewer on the DLINE. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/jn6F3aG7t7

Here's Cincy's numbers. Perine was a workhorse. He carried or caught the ball 28 out of 52 snaps. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/VKVMUA80M6

I wanted to try replicating a recent #dataviz by @tanya_shapiro that required using 'ggbeeswarm' for plotting and the 'magick' package for headshot image manipulation.

Here are your current #NFL leaders in average air yards per attempt. #nflverse https://t.co/19zPW9mMP2
Shoutout to @benbbaldwin, @mrcaseb,  @_TanHo, @LeeSharpeNFL, and everybody else involved in the #nflverse for creating/upkeeping what doubles as a fantastic pedagogical tool.
